original_text: Now when the sun was setting, all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.
korean_text: 해 질 무렵에 사람들이 온갖 병자들을 데리고 나아오매 예수께서 일일이 그 위에 손을 얹으사 고치시니

sentences.original_text: Now when the sun was setting
all they that had any sick with divers diseases
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 가지 병으로 앓는 모든 사람들이

sentences.original_text: and he laid his hands on every one of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들 각자에게 손을 얹고
